title: PDF Outline Structure
description: Defines the structure for an extracted PDF outline, including an optional title and a list of headings.

title.description: The main title of the document. This property is optional.

outline.description: A list of all the headings found in the document.

level.description: The heading level (e.g., H1, H2, H3).

text.description: The clean text content of the heading.

page.description: The 0-indexed page number where the heading appears.
